moves.1. e4 c5 2. c4: We both are liking that move
moves.2... Nc6 3. Na3: Pepeating to c3, woulda been better
moves.3... g6 4. b3 Bg7: pointing at my rook, and getting ready for a fiencetto
moves.5. Rb1 d6 6. Be2: puttin' Bob on the D1-H5 diagonal
moves.6... Nf6: Fiencetto, yes, attacking my pawn, yes
moves.7. Qc2 Nb4: That lost me a pawn unless I go on the same diagonal as his G7 bishop
moves.15... Ng4 16. Qf3 Bxb2: Let me see how this trade goes- +1-5+5-9+9-3=-2, bad trade
moves.17. Qxb7 Bxa1 18. Qxa8 Qxa8 19. Bxa8 Rxa: I don't really have a chance
moves.20. Nb5 a6 21. h3 Ne5 22. f4 Ned3+ 23. K: He could of got a knight for a pawn instead
moves.24. Nc3 Bxc3 25. dxc3: I was about to resign this, but good thing I didn't
moves.31. a4 Kg7 32. Kg1 Rc2 33. h5: I wouldn't let him mate without a queen
moves.33... Nxh5 34. Kf1 Ng3+ 35. Kg1 h5: Good game Collin, and thanks for playing.
